title: Why does Wynk Music delete downloaded songs after some time? - Quora

response.answer_text: This happens if you are using the trial version, for a week I got to use the app for free and download songs. After that I was requested to subscribe but I came to know that if you are using Airtel, the subscription is free and after 3 months you need to pay a small amount to keep your membership active and you need to pay this once after every 3 months.

They have a limited time offer for free trail. After 1 month or 7 days trail(depends upon when you have registered on that app), they remove the downloaded songs if you didn't pay for the subscription.
